mapper.select: SELECT c.id AS course_id, c.cname, t.id AS teacher_id, t.tname, sct.grade, c.ccredit FROM studentms.score sct INNER JOIN studentms.teacher t ON sct.teacher_id = t.id INNER JOIN studentms.course c ON sct.course_id = c.id WHERE sct.student_id = #{sid} AND sct.term = #{term}
